channel.title: Making custom 1 hit wepon
channel.description: ok i have a few servers tht i have downloaded and i wanted to know how do i colur create edit ect my own never done befor custom weapon make it 1 hit and thn how do i put it in the server and another thing is im 13 and i have know idea about changing stuff ormoving stuff on a server so plz dont be all confusing to me pictures wud be best to help me out or if not tht u will have to be real preschooly with me lol srry :( srry about uppercase i didnt mean to not plz yall :confused: :| :( [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnwarn.gif[/img] Read the rules[/center]

item.title: Making custom 1 hit wepon
item.dc:creator: @Dalcian Dalcian
item.description:
@Dalcian wrote:

ACCOUNT FAILED:

ok im srry is this better?srry 4 not pleasing u

It’s a start.

To make a weapon one hit… Go into item.cfg and play around with the values next to the item name.
For a custom weapon you need to get models and then add the id to class8 in your clients folder.
Finally, Log onto the server and do addmodel #### (Replace #### with the model id.)

Also, If you want to make your own model, follow this tutorial.

Read full topic

item.title: Making custom 1 hit wepon

item.description:
@Holy_Archer wrote:

Okay, and there are several things BEFORE I help you…

  1. At your age 70% more people would be smarter?..

  2. “Prescooly”? What the fuck does that mean

  3. Every post you make is usually in caps lock, TURN THE DAMNED THING OFF???

  4. DON’T USE SO MANY QUESTION MARKS???

  5. If you’re only 13 and have the knowledge of a 8 year old (I am serious) please leave.

Read full topic

item.title: Making custom 1 hit wepon
item.dc:creator: @dyde08 dyde08
item.description:
@dyde08 wrote:

Well, just a short fact here. You don’t have to be really old, i started coding at the age of 11.

Anyways, i’ve lost most of my memory towards that subject, so i can’t help you on the actual custom
item itself.

But, you have to add it to item.cfg, or w\e it is for you. And there will be numbers, you can figure out which
one is strength bonus for your self. All you have to do is change the strength bonus number to something like
10000, and you’ll ALWAYS hit a 99 on players.

Read full topic
